ActorRole.Text: Durable Power of Attorney for Healthcare

Description.Text: Patients >10 years of age with type 1 diabetes should have an initial dilated and comprehensive eye examination by an ophthalmologist or optometrist within 3–5 years after the onset of diabetes. In general, screening for diabetic eye disease is not necessary before 10 years of age.

Organization.Name: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Florida BlueScript
